reviews.review_msg: She gave me so much great feedback. Highly recommend.
She really cares about her students. Gives great feedback and marks fairly.
Hilary is an amazing instructor. She goes so far above and beyond for her students. I would take another class with her any time.
Super hard marker on papers & online presentation which weigh heavily on your marks . Avoid at all costs !

Hilary is so amazing. CRIM 455 had two big writing assignments, but she was so understanding and took the time to encourage us and make sure we felt prepared. I had trouble writing my 20 pg paper, but she offered to phone me and cleared up all my questions. TBH, I've never felt this supported by a prof or TA! She's super knowledgable, too!

Hillary is an excellent, and proficient teacher. Her attention to detail allows her students to fully understand her material. She is a fair marker which makes her very approachable. Hillary heightens her students learning experiences by going above and beyond to ensure each student has the necessary information to excel in her class.
Worst prof in my opinion. Wouldn't take again. Assignments aren't clear and she grades too hard.

She forces you to learn which is fantastic. She is super nice and approachable and always willing to help. BUT she gives out SO MANY assignments and for the amount of work they cause they are not worth the percentage weight in which they are assigned. Wouldn't take again because of the work load.
Is currently being investigated for sexual misconduct with his students. Allegation involve grooming, and coercion.

Sticky situation. Easy prof,ood lectures, got a good grade, but honestly - ethically prob not okay to be teaching this class. So biased. We paid tuition to have a VPD recruiter take up one of our lectures.

Keiron was one of my favourite professor during the Spring semester. He genuinely cares about his class and finds ways to explain or give feedback. It starts rocky but once you get to know him. He genuinely is one of the nicest professor I have taken so far. He is not an easy marker, but I would take another class with him!
